senses.sense_definition: A member of the Lake Poets, a group of English Romantic poets from the Lake District.

examples.text: The famous <w>Lakist</w> wrote many verses about the beauty of the English countryside.
She studied the works of every <w>Lakist</w> to understand the Romantic era better.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Lake Poets or their style of poetry.

examples.text: The poem has a <w>Lakist</w> quality, focusing deeply on the natural world.
Critics debated the <w>Lakist</w> tendencies found in his early manuscripts.
